metadata.title: CVE-2017-17664 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Remote Crash issue was discovered in Asterisk Open Source 13.x before13.18.4, 14.x before 14.7.4, and 15.x before 15.1.4 and Certified Asteriskbefore 13.13-cert9. Certain compound RTCP packets cause a crash in the RTCPStack.

criterions.comment: asterisk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
